name: quasi_harmonic_properties
description: quasi harmonic meta info, not specific to any code

metaInfos.name: x_qhp_formula
metaInfos.description: The chemical formula of the material for which the quasi-harmonic properties were calculated

metaInfos.name: x_qhp_quasi_harmonic_bulk_modulus
metaInfos.description: Holds the bulk modulus that is calculated from the helmolz free energy calculated from the quasi harmonic approximation

metaInfos.name: x_qhp_quasi_harmonic_free_energy
metaInfos.description: Holds the quasi harmonic free energy per atom

metaInfos.name: x_qhp_quasi_harmonic_thermal_expansion
metaInfos.description: Holds the quasi harmonic thermal expansion

metaInfos.name: x_qhp_quasi_harmonic_volume
metaInfos.description: Holds the temperature dependent volume calculated using the quasi harmonic approximation

metaInfos.name: x_qhp_space_group_3d_number
metaInfos.description: space group detected (and used) by the quasi harmonic program
